ui.tools
Class CreationTool

java.lang.Object
  ui.tools.DrawingTool
      ui.tools.CreationTool

public class CreationTool
extends DrawingTool

Creates nodes and edges by drawing with mouse in a GraphDrawingView context. NOTE: Can NOT just make changes to the graph model from here because must save each command in the command history.

Author:
helen bretzke
